idea:
airpay is India’s first integrated omnichannel financial services platform, built to eliminate inefficiencies in the business of money. With nearly a decade of experience as a payment aggregator, its platform is used globally by consumers, businesses, banks, and financial institutions. airpay’s unique open architecture integrates seamlessly into the client’s ecosystem, thus offering them real-time visibility of their transactions, advanced analytics, and reporting. India’s partner to digital financial services adoption with global ambition and growth potential, airpay, today has brought formal financial services to underserved customers.

Founded by experienced technocrat Kunal Jhunjhunwala, the company collaborates with over 200+ financial institutions and over 1,000 business partners worldwide. Over the years, airpay has established itself as a preferred partner and advisor for providing financial services technology and last-mile enablement. The platform allows its clients to move, store and give money across many touchpoints such as web, mobile, call centre, IVR, email, SMS and face-to-face through 100+ financial instruments.

As a brand philosophy, airpay aims to make formal financial services accessible to everyone, powered by a passion for technology and a soul for everything Indian.
name: airpay payment services pvt ltd

idea: Diamgrow Tech is a company tarted with the aim to grow and sell lab grown rough diamonds. With rising growth and awareness of lab grown diamonds, combined with our know-how of growing rough diamonds, we feel it is the perfect time to enter this space and cater to a large number manufacturers who do not have the ability to grow these diamonds
name: Diamgrow Tech Pvt Ltd

idea:
Patni Precision Products Pvt. Ltd. formerly known as Vidharbha Plastics, manufactures and supplies a wide range of Injection Moulded Plastic Gears & Critical Plastic Parts for Defense, Automotive industries, Electric Switchgears & Appliances, Electronic Instruments, Water Treatment Plants, Power Tools, Pharmaceutical Devices & Other Industries. We use a wide array of high-performance raw materials like PEEK, PPS, PPO, PVDF, LCP, PA46, PA12, PU, PA66, PA6, POM, PC, PBT etc.

We collaborate with our customers in the Complete Manufacturing Of bespoke Injection Molded Plastic Parts from Concept to Final Product as per Client's specifications & requirements. Our USP Lies In Developing & Manufacturing Small Parts With Accuracy & Consistency At A Competitive Price to Help Our Customers Develop Their Products With Precision.

We also manufacture & supply very robust, time tested & proven Plastic Timers for Landmine devices for Defense Industry, and Gear Boxes for Vending Machines.

We also offer holistic design solutions to our customers to help them develop their final products
name: PATNI PRECISION PRODUCTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Starting out with Education infused with Technology to teach musical instruments, art, dance. Along with setting up this channel, selling musical instruments to cater to musicians and their needs.
name: 16TH AUDIO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Electric Vehicles Charging Stations or in short EV Stations are units or junctions where one can re-energize their electric vehicles, similar to cars, trucks or bus, utilizing the machine that gives electric energy to restore the power.

Most of the likely purchasers and clients currently want to move to a greener and more secure way, keeping in mind the developing worry for the climate in light of car related fossil fuel byproducts and the resultant- which is an unnatural weather change: Global Warming

Keeping this in mind, we have come up with the idea of creating an app that links all the Electric Charging Stations together. This app will have the following benefits:

1. It will help our customers to locate the closest charging station in their area.

2. Fastest route to the charging station by showing the distance as well as the traffic percent along each route leading towards the station.

3. It will give the customers details like the percentage of their electric vehicle, cost of charging also the offers available at the various Charging Stations.

4. This app will also provide few discount offers at the time of festivals.
name: LUNARE EV STATION

idea: HUMFREE PETS PRIVATE LIMITED is comprised of a group of individuals who have brought to the forefront the concept of creating an epitome of indisputable adoration for the small wonderful animals who reside in their hearts. Humfree Pets is India's leading platform for canines and felines, and it is redefining the whole culture of pet-keeping in the country. They accomplished this feat with the highest dedication and sincerity, and their dream has become a reality. The pets have feelings just like we do. Humfree Pets understand this fact and therefore have made a platform that connects pets with other pets so that they can connect with each other and start living a happy life forever.
name: HUMFREE PETS PRIVATE LIMITED
